snippet: Prosecutors showed video of Joselito Vega taking paintings from the North Shore property of the Schulhof Collection, which was owned by two major collectors of 20th-century works.
abstract: House painter Joselito Vega is charged with the theft of a half-dozen artworks from the North Shore, LI, property of the Schulhof Collection; six pieces of art he stole while painting the interior of a home in Kings Point are worth more than $100,000 in all; if convicted on all charges, Vega faces 5 to 15 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors showed video of Joselito Vega taking paintings from the North Shore property of the Schulhof Collection, which was owned by two major collectors of 20th-century works.

headline.seo: House Painter Is Charged in Art Theft at Long Island Estate
headline.main: House Painter Is Charged in Long Island Art Thefts
headline.print_headline: House Painter Is Charged In Long Island Art Thefts
